name: Skyward Pride
effect: Increases all DMG by {0}%. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does {1}% of ATK as DMG to enemies along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.
description: A claymore that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies. When swung, it emits a deep hum as the full force of Dvalin's command of the sky and the wind is unleashed.
